name: OCKCalendarControllerProtocol
desc: An object that tracks the state of a calendar.

items.name: var store: OCKAnyEventStore
items.desc: A reference to the store that fetches and updates events.

items.name: var objectWillChange: CurrentValueSubject<[OCKCompletionRingButton.CompletionState], Never>
items.desc: A publisher that publishes completion ring states when events change in the store.
